text: I am speaking with Ms. Iwamuro of Nippon Naporitan Gakkai to learn how to cook delicious Napolitan.
The chewiness of the spaghetti is important, for sure!
And you cook it well with...
[sniff, sniff] Smells nice!
And finally...
Oops, I forgot!
Please let us know about Nippon Naporitan Gakkai!
Cooking Napolitan in Napoli.  Really impressive!
May Napolitan become widely spread in the world!
One restaurant works together with Nippon Naporitan Gakkai to spread Napolitan throughout the world.
Today, I am going to sneak into the factory!
To our surprise, Minoya Arare Seizohompo makes Napolitan-flavored cubic rice crackers!
They are dried with a machine in the end.
The colors look great with green peas inside!
Does everybody know kaki no tane?
Finally, I will enjoy Napolitan at a restaurant!
We are visiting Center Grill.
They are the first restaurant to be certified by Nippon Naporitan Gakkai.
I am sure my mouth is going to be all red with ketchup, because...
The former owner of Center Grill worked as a chef for Center Hotel,
which was run by the first master chef of the Hotel [New] Grand, Saly Weil.
High-grade tomatoes were used at the hotel.
Center Grill opened as a Western-food restaurant for townspeople and makes Napolitan using ketchup.
I understand you can visit, even if you can't speak Japanese!
Oh, I am full. ‚ù§
I must go now; Chef is waiting for me.
